author: AdrianoDee
body: This PR proposes to add to the wfs run in `relval_gpu` the `*.751` wfs running the Phase2 HLT Alpaka menu on TTbar (PU,noPU) and NuGun samples. I took the chance to remove also the old 2024 wfs, pending https://github.com/cms-sw/cms-bot/pull/2523.
title: HLT Phase2 Alpaka menu in `relval_gpu`
